name: Fortuna Health
headline: TurboTax for Medicaid
description:
Fortuna is a one-stop solution that helps consumers navigate Medicaid end-to-end from eligibility and enrollment to renewing coverage. 

Our platform creates value as the middleware layer for the $800B Medicaid ecosystem.

founders.name: Nikita Singareddy, Founder
founders.description: Building the TurboTax for 90M Americans on Medicaid. Did things at Truepill, a16z, RRE Ventures, and Oscar Health.

generated_description:
**Fortuna Health: Simplifying Medicaid Navigation**

Fortuna Health is a fresh player on the healthcare scene, founded in 2023 and operating out of New York as part of the Y Combinator S23 batch. With just a lean team of six, Fortuna aims to be the "TurboTax for Medicaid," offering a comprehensive one-stop solution for Medicaid navigation—from checking eligibility and enrollment to coverage renewal.

**What They Do**

In an $800 billion Medicaid ecosystem, Fortuna acts as crucial middleware that streamlines the Medicaid experience. Their digital platform ensures that navigating Medicaid is not just easier but also significantly more efficient. Users can complete eligibility checks in as little as 30 seconds without the headache of complicated forms. Fortuna offers guided enrollment and renewal processes tailored to consumers’ unique situations, which means that everything operates much faster and with far fewer barriers.

With a 95% application approval rate, Fortuna enhances consumer experience by removing the traditional friction involved in Medicaid processes. They utilize dynamic state-specific enrollment and provide multilingual support around the clock, making Medicaid accessible to everyone, regardless of their circumstances.

**Key Features**

- **Fast Eligibility Checks**: Users can get speedy screenings for government coverage without complicated steps.
- **Efficient Enrollment/Renewal**: A well-designed interface guides users through the necessary administrative tasks seamlessly.
- **Real-Time Notifications**: Fortuna keeps users updated on their application status, ensuring they never miss an important action.
- **Personalized Engagement**: By providing tailored interactions and tools, Fortuna has significantly ramped up renewal rates, with 52% of users completing their tasks the same day.

**Why Fortuna Stands Out**

Fortuna Health is more than just a software solution; it’s built by and for people who have experienced the challenges of navigating Medicaid. They understand the pain points—no one wants to deal with endless paperwork or wait times on hold. By providing a simpler, faster, and more digital experience, Fortuna makes it easy for consumers to access their benefits without unnecessary stress.

**Partnership Opportunities**

Fortuna also welcomes collaboration with health plans and providers interested in offering their clients a smoother Medicaid experience. Their approach can not only improve consumer satisfaction but also contribute positively to bottom lines by minimizing care gaps.

In summary, Fortuna Health is poised to transform the way people interact with Medicaid by making the process efficient and user-friendly. With their innovative tech, they are meeting consumers where they are and simplifying what has traditionally been a confusing and cumbersome experience. For more information, visit their [website](https://fortunahealth.com/).
